Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Door latch mechanism failure to engage. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel System component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 23/11/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
